name: High-Fly-Hi
description:
A puzzle game about placing Wi-Fi routers to achieve the best coverage of a house you can.

Also comes with a level editor to make your own levels!

A game made for Global Game Jam 2018. This version is slightly more advanced than the jam version,  finished a couple hour session after the jame ended, so we didn’t feel right putting this version on the jam site.

This version allows for infinite levels, has more accurate level scoring, and various bug fixes/quality of life improvements.

Chris Chen: UI Programming

Jordan Faas-Bush: Level Editor Programming

Etienne Morakotkarn: General Programming

David Pierce: Audio and General Programming
